name: Crash Course (Brandon Diaz)
description:
Aided by the Artificial Intelligence known as AEGIS, Engineer 023 must find a way to contact their fleet after crashing on an unknown planet.

Controls are configurable in game, but default to the following:

  • [D] - Interact / Confirm
  • [S] - Skip Dialog / Cancel
  • [Arrows] - Move / Navigate Menus
  • [Enter] - Pause
  • [Delete] - Pause

Created in 10 days using JavaScript during GBJam #5 with the following palette:

  • #434315
  • #787834
  • #B2B270
  • #CACA9A
